posts.post_title: Pair of 1909-10 Obak Oddities - Ghost Print & Reverse Multi-strike ** BOTH SOLD! **
posts.post_content:
Both of these are significant printing goofs / oddities  that come up very seldom!

Asking $495 for the Eastley Ghost and $475 for the 1909 Eagan.

Brian
